entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Orillia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:25 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 1:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: -2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -5.6°C
Wind: NNW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets early this evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
